/>
IX.iii.1.E.8.b
.
How SOOs Are Alerted That System-Generation of an Income Reminder Letter Failed
When system-generation of the
Income Reminder Letters
fails, the SOO is alerted by the generation of an 800 series work item.  The message code for this work item is
820 882C, SOC SEC Income Reminder Letter not sent
.
When the work item appears in a regional office’s (ROs) inventory, the RO must
send a locally-generated letter with the text noted in
M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, 1.E.8.c
, and
clear the pending 800 series work item.
References
:  For more information on 800 series work items, see
M21-4, Appendix B, 3 and 4
Share User Guide
, and
VETSNET 800 Series Work Items Desk Reference
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section E - Pension - Basic Rate Determinations
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section E
